text: Owange Mutabani wange mazima kyo (e kikolwa) ne bwe kiba kyenkana obuzito bwempeke ya Khardali, keebe nga eri mu lwazi oba mu ggulu omusanvu oba e nsi, Katonda agenda kukireeta (asasule e yakikola) mazima Katonda amanyidde ddala ebitalabika, ate buli kintu akimanyidde ddala okuva ku ntobo yaakyo
